fields.summary: iOS: Time Picker minuteInterval does not set value correctly for minutes

comments.body:
Tested and confirmed on iOS Simulator 5.1, TiSDK 2.1.2, 2.1.3 and 3.0.0.

When minuteInterval has the values 20, 5 or 2 and 'origstartminute' is set to 40, it sets the initial minutes in the picker to 20; and when it's set to 20, it sets the initial minutes in the picker to 40.

It is setting values for minutes correctly.
Environment used for verification -
Titanium SDK: 3.1.0.v20130114171802
Titanium Â Studio: 3.0.1.201212181159
Device : Simulator iOS 6.0, iPHONE 3G S	iOS 5.0.1
